Reason: back pain neck pain from disc
Side Effects: Originally I took Voltaren for back pain from a herniated disc_ which I later had surgery for.  I handled this drug ok_ when I was in my 30's.  I took it in conjunction with a muscle relaxant (Flexeril).  Now_ years later_ I have tried it again for severe headaches and shoulder pain etc. from a violent neck injury.  Even taking it just once makes a world of difference!  It handles my pain better than major perscription pain relievers.  However_ the side effects are the worst leg cramps imaginable.  Sometimes it takes days for the cramps to show up_ but they do_ and can come and go for over 2 weeks.  It is really too bad_ because the drug worked great when I was younger_ and kept me together until I could have the surgeries.
Comments: If you find that you can tolerate this drug_ you are fortunate because it makes a huge difference in your ability to live your life if you have something really wrong with you...and this is your option for the short term...just do NOT take even one more than you absolutely have to_ because I think you can reach a "tip over" point_ and then_ like me_ you can't take it anymore.  Take it with food and lots of milk_ and don't lie down for an hour at least.  Good Luck.

Side Effects: Upset stomach_ diarrhea_ bad heartburn_ excessive sleepiness_ headache

After 5 days of using the Voltaren gel I developed constant gas and some weight gain.  I used it another 5 days thinking I had picked up a bug or something.  Quit using the gel and the gas had decreased some but is still an all day thing.  Weight gain is gone.  I have been off Voltaren 5 days.
Comments: Voltaren gel did improve the pain in my elbow.  I was happy with it the first few days.  After stopping the gel_ some of the pain has returned.

Side Effects: Voltaren Gel-no problems! I didn't realize that some of my symptoms were the meds until reading this website. Bad dreams(fell out bed)_ horrible stomach pains_ nausea & vomiting_ wheezing(I thought was my Congestive Heart Failure) which my Dr keep telling me everything is fine on my test. So I'm having him to order additional test. Tenderness in my abdomen and sometimes it seems like the soreness moves to different areas. I think also it may be contributing to severe constipation. Not sure!
Comments: It helps with the pain in my shoulder and in my back due to Degenerative Disc Disease & herniated disc. The side effects are not beneficial enough for me to continue taking the medication.

Side Effects: No side effects so far
Comments: Helped a great deal with my back pain. Have taken in the past with no issues also

Reason: Arthritis_ pain in foot and hands
Side Effects: Moderate increase in blood pressure_ increase in weight 4 kgs_ reduced libido_ indigestion if taken with alcohol_ sometimes mild fatique posibly due to dehydration_ sometimes moderate insomnia_ easily countered with mild short term sleeping pill.
Comments: Works beter for me than the other options like Arcoxia. Best if taken with 2 Panadol. I try to miss one or 2 days a week to provide relief for stomach and liver. Have liver and kidney function tests every 6 months. Drink lots of water during the day helps.

Side Effects: Severe stomach pain_ intestinal pain_ tightness in chest with lightheadedness and feeling over heated.
Comments: I was given this as a last ditch option to relieve pain/inflammation but the side effects have just caused me more problems after only taking 5 pills over 3 days. I still am having stomach and intestinal pain a month later! I'm praying it isn't a permanent ailment!

Side Effects: Severe diarrhea and vomiting. I had my colitis under control for about two years_ now it is back and extremely bad. This medication that I paid $20.00 for will now cost me $430.00 a month to try to get me back to normal! If you have Crohns or colitis do not risk taking this medication! One pill caused me all these problems.
Abdominal pain after taking for a few days. Weakness_ night sweats and constipation
Comments: Have taken before_ to good effect_ but can no longer take the risk. Make sure to take with food

Side Effects: None
Comments: Voltaren has been the best medicine for my acute pain - i am able to do normal activities like work_ gym housework - very important! I recommend taking it with lots of food - and only for a few days at a time -

Side Effects: Severe stomach pain that will wake you up at night_ nausea_ diarrhea_ weak_ pelvic pain making you feel like you are having the worst cramps ever_ feeling of movement in abdomen_ stabbing pain in upper right stomach
Comments: horrible horrible horrible! Took it over 12 hours ago and still feel like death.

Side Effects: Unable to eat or drink and became dehydrated. Very weak_unable to get out of bed.  Went the ER and was admitted to hospital with severe gastrointestinal bleeding. Was in hospital for 7 days and received 8 units of blood.  Dr. considered removing my entire colon if they could not get bleeding to stop. I've never had this type of problem before taking Voltaren.
Comments: I can no longer take any kind of Nsaid. I am also worried that this condition could reoccur.  Everyone thought I was going to die never leaving the hospital.

Side Effects: Odor of drug emitted from body for weeks after stoppage
Comments: Moderately effective for pain relief

Side Effects: No side effects at the morning dose but a mild headache in the evening.
Comments: When I took my first pill_ I had immediate relief from knee pain that had kept me from sleeping well for over three months. It is a very good pain medicine for me.

Side Effects: Tiredness_ nausea_ gurgling stomach_ vivid nightmares_ sudden and severe diarrhea_ extreme vomiting
Comments: I was prescribed this drug by my doctor in France who has just started treating me for ongoing pain from spondylitis_ tendonitis and chronic pain throughout my body. I have suffered widespread pain since a car crash over 3 years ago and tried all sorts of pain relief to no good _ lasting effect. I also have pain in my ankles after walking about half a kilometer. Taking Volaren has helped to take the edge of the pain and the first two days were fine_ but the evening of the third_ I had sudden diarrhea that was nasty and then was violently sick. This is the day after- i feel weak and unable to face much in the way of food. I have just taken a pill today with a slice of toast and a little soup. I am hoping that I will be ok as I would like to give this drug a chance. If I am sick again I will have to revert to codeine and amatryptyline. Don't want to as that has caused me side effects too_ worst being weight gain. I also take Omeprazole from the doctor to help counteract the potential for damage to the stomach from Voltatren.

Reason: in  March 2014 I hurt my left foot
Side Effects: None so far
Comments: Limped for a year every step I took was painful  I thought I was going to be like that  for good was sent for xray and ultrarsound then eventually sent for an MRI which showed that I had multiple fractures I was on holiday at my sons and he gave me Voltaren I didn't take it every day  I have never taken it before or was offered it but one day I noticed I was walking normally I couldn't believe it

Side Effects: Rapid weight loss _ nausea_
Comments: Relieves pain I have associated with multiple fractures and long term chronic pain however have lost 15 kilograms in two weeks since taking it _ causes nausea_ diarrhoea _taking it with pain medication_ no pain _ felt fantastic stopped taking it due to weight loss however pain has increased and is more intense since stopped taking it _ bloody mucous in stools while taking it

Side Effects: Servers stomach cramps_ burping_ diarrhoea _extremely tired _ nausea _on the upside relieved bone and joint aches
Comments: Catch 22 relives body / joint/ arthritis pain but causes numerous side effects

Side Effects: Very minor: I find that some days I cannot tolerate burn-your-mouth-hot spicy foods without a little Pepto. Most days there are no problems. The benefits FAR outweigh losing the extreme zip of a great_ hot chili.
Comments: Diclo is my first line of defence against my arthritis. It is by far the most effective anti-inflammatory I've tried & also the one with the least side effects.

Side Effects: Nausea_ diarrhea_ gas_ intestinal pain_ upper stomach pain_ acid indigestion.Symptoms started a week into taking it.I didn't connect the symptoms with the medication at first.
Comments: Stopped the drug 2 days ago_ but side effects lingering.

Side Effects: Severe stomach cramps.a few hours after taking just one pill.ive taken them before and never made the connection with the cramps.this web site confirms my suspicions about the drug as so many others have suffered the same reaction. What a great tool this website is.
Stomach aches _ back aches _ excessive vomiting after meals _ drowsiness
Severe stomach pain and diarrhoea one day after finishing taking voltaren.  This is the second day of pain_ diarrhoea has ceased but this may just be because I haven't eaten.
Comments: I will never take this drug again. The side effects are worse than any illness I have ever experienced.

Side Effects: Didn't notice any  . I had surprised dark bags under my eyes but I believe was fr wearing wrong glasses

Reason: Sore swallen ribs after a fall
Side Effects: Excessive gas _burping and finally severe stomach cramps .
After three weeks developed horrible headaches_ and itching all over my body!

Reason: pain in tops of feet/ pinched nerve
Side Effects: Some diareaha

Reason: Arthritis in knee and plantar fad
Side Effects: None
Comments: Taken off and on.    Right now take one every other day with food!   Pain subsides in order to play tennis.   Maybe in my mind but it works better than ibrebrofen.  Took ibrebrofen for two weeks_ caused high blood pressure_ came off them went away.   Will be careful and when not playing will stop voltren!

Side Effects: Feel a bit mellow for a little while after taking the tablet but can still fully function.
Comments: The day after I took the first tablet the excruciating pain in my foot was gone - though it is still tender to touch.  After limping around for 2 months I wish I had gone to the Doctors sooner.

Reason: Lower back pain and shoulder pain
Side Effects: None
Comments: I always follow direction ie food and don't lie down for half hour.  I have awesome results with pain reduction but only ever use a few days at a time.  Aphrodisiac effect but may be just that I feel good no pain.

Reason: Lower back pain due to slipped disc
Side Effects: Severe stomach cramps. Diarrhea. Pain in stomach was so bad will not try again.
After 5 days of taking meds started post menopausal spotting which turned to bleeding and 2 weeks later I am still spotting. This med is also a labor inducer.

Reason: Upper outer leg pain from a fall
Side Effects: Numbness and Tingling down left arm_ Left hand went numb had hardly any feeling in it could not pick up objects it also turned blue/purple and was very cold went straight to emergency they didn't know why the only thing we could think was I had a reaction to the Tablets..  It was a scary experience so I Stopped taking them...
Comments: Started taking the Voltaren Rapid Tablets again 1 week ago for 5 days but have been getting horrible headaches the pain seems to be at the back of my head and behind my eyes I also have a small hive/rash on inside of both wrist so I have disposed of Tablets looks like first time was definitely a reaction to the Tablets.

Side Effects: I had an allergic reaction to this medication. My skin has be itchy_ sore throat/burning/itchy_ and numbness in tongue and gums. Stop med and been taking Benadryl.

Took three pills in a day and a half and it put me in the er twice.  Once for elevated bloodb pressure and dizziness...  other for severe gastritis.  Do not take this pill if you have stomach or blood pressure problems.  Scary pill!
Stomach cramps_ diarrhea_ fatigue
Made me very very tired_ wanted to vomit but couldn't. Was to take one morning and night_ couldn't take one in the morning or i was back in bed! My hands and hip pain remain.
none
Comments: Stopped pain and muscle spasms the next day! I now take it as necessary. I also take a buffer with this.  It is misoprostol 200MG.

Side Effects: It helps relieve chronic pain but over time_ causes intestinal pain and bleeding. I had symptoms similar to diverticulitis: blood in stool_ pain.
Comments: I would be cautious about paying attention to cramping_ intestinal/stomach pain which can lead to very serious conditions.

Side Effects: I was on Voltaren to work as an anti-inflammatory for my infection. The drug was horrible. On second day of my medication_ I experience an excruciating pain in my stomach_ like gastric - but much worse. Along with that I also had a sharp pain on my shoulder and couldnt sit straight. I was admitted to hospital after 20 min of the pain and given MORPHINE when my doc knew that I was on Voltaren. It was acute gastritis. Worst adverse reaction I have ever experience. Doc told me to opt for non-NSAIDs such as aspirin next time.

no side effects whatsoever. after 12 days on voltaren (75mg twice daily) i am still bruising and having inflammation especially around my elbow where the ulner nerve is compressed. haven't noticed any difference/relief from this drug. i don't have anything bad to say about this drug...it just didn't work for me.
I did not experience any_ but only took 1 tab once a day for two days.
Comments: I found that Voltaren took away all my pain_ i rarely use pain relief because i find it never helps or takes too long to take affect and just "soldier on".As i am only young and relatively healthy i did not experience any side effects... HOWEVER my parents both have had bad side effects.... so i dont recommend it if you suffer from High blood pressure_ IBS_ are prone to stomache ulcers_ prone to reflux_ heart burn or are an asthmatic.Otherwise if like me you are healthy and just need pain relief when nothing else will cut it just take one a day_ and dont stay on them.. the chances of getting side effects seem to increase according to the length of time you continue using them (like most drugs) and the effectiveness of the pain relief can also wear off over time.

Side Effects: 8 hours after taken voltaren_ I had a severe allergic reaction.  My skin felt like it was moving_ and the itch on my head_ genitals and lips was excruciating.  My lips started to swell_ then my tongue.  Luckily I had an epipen in the medicine cupboard_ and that saved me.
Comments: I had taken this medication many times before for gout and a bit of arthritis.  This was the first time I had the reaction. I am now severely allergic to NSAIDs.

Side Effects: Severe stomach cramps and diarrhea
Comments: I will never use it again_ worst drug ever

Side Effects: After 3 doses of this med over 24 hour period_ my pain was better; however_ I experienced severe stomach cramping and diarrhea.  IBS_ which had been under control_ seems to have returned with a vengeance!
none whatsoever
Comments: I started taking voltaren twice a day and then switched to once a day which pretty much takes away all my pain.  However_ I have read so much on the side effects that I now only take it once or twice a week.  I am 68 and if I take it every day I feel like a 25 yr old.  It also takes care of all my arthritis pain as well.  I love it and wish it didn't have so many side effects.

Side Effects: Taken for excruciating disc related shooting pains through my hips and down both legs. Was fine for the first 2 days_ didn't feel much change in the pain but started feeling nauseous all the time which makes it hard to take because I need to take them with food. Havent had any for 2 days and still feel sick all the time_ I'm supposed to take them for 3 weeks but I think I'll just go back to the dr and ask for the cortisone injection.

Severe stomach cramps and diarea. Headache and drowsiness. Only took two pills. Will never take again due to the severity of the side effects. Cramps so bad that I felt like removing my intestines. Very scary pills... I'm done with pills...forever.
my feet would turn red or purple_ but otherwise no side effects
Comments: It didn't seem to help my feet at all. Didn't even decrease the pain a little bit and by the 8th it seemed to make it worse. I'm taking a break for a couple days and then might try it again.

Side Effects: Eye problem_ noticed after 1 day my vision was not the same_ seem to be harder to focus_After putting 2 an 2 together I stopped taken the Voltaren Rapid 50mg_It has been 5 days sens I stopped taken them and my left eye is getting bad_ loss of colour depth and everything is smaller and takes longer to focus then other eye_
Comments: dont take them_

Side Effects: occasionally some leg cramps (in lower left leg only) if taken too late in the day.  No side effects if taken before noon.
Comments: This drug has helped tremendously with aches and discomfort from the arthritis.  Totally cured the pain in my foot from tendonitis and plantar fasciitis.

Side Effects: This drug makes me so agitated--insomnia_ hideously increased muscle tension_ short tempered_ impatient.
Comments: It really helped with pain in hand & arm_ but the agitation is unbearable.  I got spasms in my back from it and had to get therapy for those.  I know it doesn't make sense with the tiny dose I'm taking_ & they say no systemic effects from the topical gel_ but I've gone on & off it 4 or 5 times now and the effects when using it are unmistakeable.

Reason: For RA and OA joint pain
Side Effects: Very rough on my stomach. It does not matter if I take it with food or not.
Comments: Voltaren Gel rub is great though!

Side Effects: Mild sedation.
Comments: This is a GREAT drug for me. I am usually VERY affected negatively with most meds. Voltaren totally relieves my pain when nothing else worked. I take it with a meal so I don't have any stomach problems with it. It mellows me out a little but not too much.

Side Effects: Horrific medication - Suffered an acute pancreatic attack with critical blood levels that almost caused my death. My entire body was "shutting" down.  My blood reports were at critical levels_ BP was very low 98/60_ fever for over 6 weeks_ weight loss of 10 lbs._yellow color to my skin_ couldn't walk straight_prostate infection_ sweating_ nausea_ pain in stomach & back_ urination effected_ hoarseness/coughing_ heart racing_ disoriented. Then the doctor in charge left us floundering on our own_ going from one specialist after another to counter what was happening. My children did some research on the web about my drugs that I was taking_ which included Voltaren_and learned about the adverse reactions to this drug and I stopped Voltaren. The specialists agreed with this conclusion_ since they were exact to my problems. My body reacted and I recovered gradually.  My advice to all - STOP - Find something else. I lost 2 months of my life and I still don't remember the entire e
Comments: If you are taking this drug - Make absolutely sure that you get blood work done every 6 months_ in order to catch any critical levels in your blood. Then - STOP - the drug.

Side Effects: Possibly diarrhea and stomach pain_ but most likely none because I am taking this with a nasty antibiotic for a sinus infection that definitely causes diarrhea and nausea.
Comments: I was supposed to take it 2x/day for 7 days and then 2x/day as needed.  I completed the 7 days and then did not take it on the 8th day.  The pain was immediately worse than before taking Voltaren.  It does help the pain in my knee_ which is a strained meniscus_ but I'm afraid that the drug is masking the pain which enables me to overexert my joints and cause more injury.  This really makes me nervous.  I am going to speak with my doctor about this possibility.

Side Effects: I had no side effects the first two days. The doctor prescribed for me to take 2 per day and I'm very glad I didn't. I took one per day and this is the third day. My face has felt numb most of the day and I feel light headed. I've had to get up and walk this feeling off_ which has not been fun on the knee.
Comments: I wouldn't suggest voltaren because it did nothing for the inflammation in the knee and has me in a panic until I can get this stuff out of my system.

Side Effects: No side effects at all in first 24 hours.
Comments: First day. Immediate and absolute relief.  I don't get immediate and lasting relief from panadeine or Ibuprofen plus.  Codeine medications aren't as effective and upset my stomach on occasions.  So far this voltaren rapid 25 hasn't.  First time in years my back ache has gone away so effectively.  Really hope it last and i can wake up still feeling completely pain free.

Side Effects: dry mouth (also taking cymbalta)
Comments: when i first took voltaren_ i didn't feel it helped me at all.  however when i stopped_ i was in a great deal more pain the following day.  when i restarted it_ i started feeling better.  so it doesn't get rid of my pain_ but does seem to make it more bearable.

Side Effects: Extreme upset stomach...couldn't eat or drink anything
Comments: It did take away all of my pain and I was able to sleep very well through the night. It's just too bad that it upset my stomach so much. I didn't have any other side effects than this one.

Side Effects: I took one dose and 15 minutes later i felt dizzy and had chest pain and felt like my life was gonna slip away and die
Comments: i called my Dr and he is an idiot ..he told me that this medicine does not cause these symptoms I hate when Pharmecitical company push these and have DR's advertise and experiment on us like animals they jsut make us sicker

Side Effects: Heartburn and stomach upset.
Comments: It seems to be working pretty well.  I still have pain but less severe.  I have been somewhat concerned about taking this drug for so long due to the possible side effects_ but my Dr. checks me out (blood work_ etc.)every four months and I seem to be doing allright.  I don't want to get started on stronger_ possibly habit forming drugs.

Side Effects: This drug MAY have caused edema of fingers and face after taking for 4 days. Also may have caused shortness of breath. Also some crabbiness and cramping (as in menstrual) and spotting. Timing off for a true period_ so suspect Voltaren is the culprit.
Comments: Took one 50 mg pill each day for 5 days. The first day it seemed to make all the pain of a muscle spasm in shoulder go away. It almost seemed like a miracle. The effects diminished each day (I have pain almost all the time) and now my face and fingers are swollen and I am short of breath_ cramping and bloated. Interesting to see females posting similar troubles. I will NEVER take another one of these.

Side Effects: Extreme diarrhea_ vomiting_ extreme sweating_ dizzyness_ very weak_ powerful chills but no fever_ bloody discharge.
Comments: Very bad reaction by my body.

Side Effects: It's not clear that there were any.  I'm concerned that I'm imagining them because of the long list of potential side effects.  Medicine is scary_ but it's sure working...
Comments: This drug was prescribed to help with severe knee pain while I wait for additional diagnostics and possibly surgery after 1/1 (due to high deductible on health insurance).  Pain was bad enough that I had trouble standing up from sitting position.  After about 24 hours_ the pain was essentially gone and has stayed gone so far.

Side Effects: cramps _diarreah  dont take this stuff

I was on celebrex till the SCARE of death took me off.  Went on voltaren.  Had wild dreams_gurgling stomach_tired_ moody. 4 months ago my heart stopped and they said I have high blood press.  I never had it before.  I find out on the net that voltaren over long times can actually cause hypertension.  I  now use tylenol extra for arthritis. Voltaren should in my opinion be given rectally to the mfg.
Comments: It did alleviate the arthritis pain.  It also made me dependent on tagamet after a few years. ThenI find out they two are not to be taken together. I was on voltaren for over 3 years.

Side Effects: dizziness first few days_ mild nausea

I was taking 75mg only once every three or four days.  At first it was miraculous_ no pain...I felt fabulous_ except I did notice mild headache..  Then the side effects kicked in.  Now _ if I take only one pill_ I have abdominal cramps_ followed by diarrhea_ lots of it!  Also_ LOTS of gas_ gurgling_ mild cramping all day.  I tried one more today_ immediately got a bad headache_ and cramping_ nausea_ and heartburn. That does it.. I'm going back to iubrofen!
Comments: I took this the first time in February 2008_ and have taken it occasionally since.Basically it works great for my pain_ but I can't live with the side effects.

Side Effects: Took for 2 weeks. Towards the end_ began getting tightness in my throat_ tingling eyes and lips. These symptoms worsened over the following two weeks_ especially the tightness in my throat until a severe case resulted in me colapsing from a heart attack and hospitalised for a week.
Comments: Would never use it again or reccommend it.

Side Effects: Stomach cramps
Comments: When taken infrequently worked fine. No side effects When taking it twice daily side effects kicked in after one week.

Side Effects: Lots of stomach gurgling after eating_ which has been consistent even after adjusting to the medication_ and initial doses gave diarrhea for a few days.  I have switched to taking it with a snack before bedtime with good results.
Comments: For me_ it has been very effective pain relief for my chronic bone/joint pain from a broken elbow.  So effective that I was able to substantially reduce the amount of narcotic pain reliever I was using once the Voltaren kicked in after about 2 days.

Side Effects: None
Comments: I have a slipped vertabrae and a degenerative disk.  This medicine has been extrememly helpful.  I don't take it daily_ but at the first sign of a flare and it helps almost immediately.  I tried Relafen_ vicodine_ flexeril and OTC pain relief and nothing has helped like this.

Side Effects: It only took three pills only one a day to realize that the side effects can be quite dangerous. On the first night my heart was thumping pretty hard all night and weird chest pains. On second night same thing plus pain in my kidney area as well as stomach. The third night was all of the night before plus nausea and skin irritation. The side effects quit after 4rth night. Volteren did nothing to help my arm.
Comments: Even with a full stomach_ this pill can be very hard to handle. Side effects can easily bring you closer to the grave.

Side Effects: stomach upset and  notable  dehydration.
Comments: i would recommend plenty of food and water with this medicene.

Side Effects: unbearable stomach cramps on the fifth day -- vomiting for about 7 hours straight until I went to the Emergency Room.  They ended up cutting out my appendix -- I think it was inflamed due to the medicine.

I have vaginal bleeding and cramping. . . it's taken me almost a week to realize this bleeding is due to the medication.  The bleeding started almost immediately after taking the first dose.  I initially thought I was having my period (even though it was not time).  If anyone can give me info regarding how long this bleeding and cramping lasts_ I would appreciate it.

I have vaginal bleeding and my vaginal skin burns a lot_ my cycle was back (I'm menopausal )_ breast painOther symptoms I have: erithema_ my skin is so dry I have little cuts on my hands_ I 'm sweating a lot (usually I don't)_ pruritus ani etc.
Comments: I took it 3 times: the first for 3 days_ then I stopped because it didn't make  great improvements and I had diarrhea. My doctor told me the symptoms had to go away after taking few moreSecond time: I took other 3 pills in 3 days. little improvement with the pain. I had the first vaginal bleeding_ a lot of pruritus and my skin was all red but I didn't know it was diclofenac. My doctor prescribed me a topical cream _ did some vaginal testto exclude infections. I had my cycleThe last one for 4 days. More problems and this time I had the idea to go on Internet and I discovered I had a lot of the side effects by taking  it

Side Effects: On day 8_ starting wheezing at night.  During the next 3 days the wheezing became a 24/7 side effect_ with it being so bad at night_ I couldn't sleep for more than 45 minutes.  The wheezing literally woke me up_ it was so loud. I also got a severe skin rash on the back of my neck_ and on the back of one hand.
Comments: Doc said I was the first person in his practice who ever had an allergic reaction to this drug_ and
